description:
godoc: remove "need more packages?" link

Its need will be addressed in another way by the redesign.

Fixes issue 2719.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM On Wed, Jan 18, 2012 at 7:56 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg > > > Description: > godoc: remove "need more packages?" link > > Its need will be addressed in another way by the redesign. > > Fixes issue 2719. > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5536062/ > > Affected files: > M lib/godoc/package.html > > > Index: lib/godoc/package.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/lib/godoc/package.html > +++ b/lib/godoc/package.html > @@ -131,11 +131,6 @@ >

> {{end}} > {{with .Dirs}} > -

> - Need more packages? The > - Package > Dashboard > - provides a list of **goinstallable > packages. > -

> {{/* DirList entries are numbers and strings - no need for FSet */}} >

**Subdirectories

>

> > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b81423ab1811 ***

godoc: remove "need more packages?" link

Its need will be addressed in another way by the redesign.

Fixes issue 2719.
